case_description: Customer unable to login to portal
related_data_summary: Account: TechCorp Inc., Industry: Technology, Contact: John Doe (john@techcorp.com), Recent Comments: Password reset attempted 3 times
expected_summary: Customer John Doe from TechCorp Inc. is experiencing login issues. Multiple password reset attempts have been made. Account is active with no restrictions.
expected_next_actions: 1. Verify account status and password reset token validity. 2. Check for any IP restrictions or security policies. 3. Provide temporary access credentials. 4. Schedule follow-up to ensure resolution.

related_data_summary: Account: Global Solutions LLC, Industry: Finance, Contact: Sarah Smith (sarah@globalsolutions.com), Recent Emails: Invoice #12345 disputed, Contract shows $5000 but invoice shows $6500
expected_summary: Sarah Smith from Global Solutions LLC has raised a billing discrepancy. Contract amount is $5000 but invoice #12345 shows $6500. Account is in good standing.
expected_next_actions: 1. Review contract terms and invoice line items. 2. Verify any additional charges or amendments. 3. Coordinate with billing team for adjustment. 4. Send corrected invoice or explanation.

related_data_summary: Account: StartupXYZ, Industry: Software, Contact: Mike Johnson (mike@startupxyz.com), Recent Comments: Requesting REST API access for data sync
expected_summary: Mike Johnson from StartupXYZ is requesting API integration capabilities for CRM data synchronization. Account is on Standard plan.
expected_next_actions: 1. Review current plan and API access eligibility. 2. Provide API documentation and integration guide. 3. Suggest upgrade to Enterprise plan if needed. 4. Schedule technical consultation call.

related_data_summary: Account: Enterprise Corp, Industry: Manufacturing, Contact: Lisa Brown (lisa@enterprisecorp.com), Recent Emails: Multiple users reporting 502 errors, Attachments: error_screenshots.png
expected_summary: Lisa Brown from Enterprise Corp reports critical service outage. Multiple users experiencing 502 errors. Account is Enterprise tier with SLA commitment.
expected_next_actions: 1. Escalate to infrastructure team immediately. 2. Check server status and load balancer health. 3. Provide status updates every 30 minutes. 4. Prepare incident report and root cause analysis.

related_data_summary: Account: Analytics Inc., Industry: Data Services, Contact: David Lee (david@analyticsinc.com), Recent Comments: Requesting data from Jan 2023 to Dec 2023 in CSV format
expected_summary: David Lee from Analytics Inc. is requesting historical data export for the period Jan 2023 to Dec 2023 in CSV format. Account has data export permissions.
expected_next_actions: 1. Verify data export permissions and compliance requirements. 2. Prepare data extraction query for specified period. 3. Generate CSV file and upload to secure location. 4. Send download link with expiration notice.
